information.l2: - Each team starts with 130 minutes on their clock
information.l3: - If you get stuck, each level has 3 clues and each clue costas 1 minute time reduction
information.l4: - Every 5 min each player has to drink 5cl of beer
information.l5P: [bold cyan]- The team with the most time left in the end wins[/bold cyan]

commands.menu_fyi: Type the anserw to the challange, or desired game command and hit enter
commands.get_clue: [[bold red]?[/bold red]] = Clue to current challenge

no_clues_left.l1: [bold red]This level has no clues[/bold red]

more_questions.l1: [bold red]This level has no clues[/bold red]
